items.name: Elliot Black w/Gold
items.description: The Elliot is a modern take on the iconic 1950’s Browline style. Crafted from premium acetate and sporting sleek arms, silver accents and a retro monel bridge, this frame exudes a classic cool.

items.name: Ottoto Bellona Tortoise w/Gold
items.description: The Bellona is a stylish round frame that doesn't play by the rules. Crafted from premium acetate, it features a decorated monel bridge, elegant arms and adjustable silicone nose pads for a comfortable fit.

items.name: Muse Hopper Tortoise
items.description: The Muse Hopper is a smart full-rim frame with a hint of cat-eye. It features a low saddle bridge, sleek rims and elegant arms with a rich hue.

items.name: Weston Tortoise
items.description: The Weston is a well-rounded frame for a well-rounded individual. Crafted from premium acetate, it flaunts monel temples and a rich tortoise hue.

items.name: Port Black
items.description: The Port is an elegant frame crafted from premium acetate. Sporting sleek arms and an angular design this is your ultimate "no fuss" frame.
